title: Shadows of the Soul
description: Author's Note: For years now, Lunacy has been after me to write a Conqueror story. I never was that fond of Armegeddon Now, but Lunacy lives in Miami, and knows where my house is. So – as a compromise, I decided to write a sorta kinda conqueror type story and here it is.This is the first book in the Xena the Merciless series.Cover by Calli’s Creations (www.calliscreations.com)
author: Melissa Good
